alert.note: Alert for Aroostook; Penobscot; Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 2:32PM EDT until August 02 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Piscataquis County in north central Maine... Central Aroostook County in northern Maine... North central Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 232 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Moosehorn Crossing, or 29 miles northwest of Patten, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Masardis, Oxbow, Moosehorn Crossing, Grand Lake Seboeis and Garfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
